metadata.title: W3Schools.com

metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: Java is a popular programming language, created in 1995.
content.html: Java is a popular programming language, created in 1995.

content.text: It is owned by Oracle, and more than 3 billion devices run Java.
content.html: It is owned by Oracle, and more than 3 billion devices run Java.

content.text: When you are finished with this tutorial, you will be able to write basic Java programs and create real-life examples.
content.html: When you are finished with this tutorial, you will be able to write basic Java programs and create real-life examples.

content.text: It is not necessary to have any prior programming experience.
content.html: It is not necessary to have any prior programming experience.
